seo_content:
Exclusive Fintokei Trading Offer

Fintokei, based in the Czech Republic, was established in April 2023. The firm is a CFD provider offering 3 Steps, 2 Steps, and 1 Step programs. It supports MT5, cTrader, TradingView and MT4 platforms. Fintokei describes itself as an education and evaluation company for traders, providing a structured environment to improve trading skills. certified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: Fintokei Promo Code: Check website Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with Fintokei using our exclusive discount code. confirmed for the current trading season.
